channel.title: CVE Feed for Citrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Citrix -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-2049|2024-03-12T12:43:50.905Z -- Citrix -- Citrix SD-WAN Standard/Premium Editions
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in Citrix SD-WAN Standard/Premium Editions on or after 11.4.0 and before 11.4.4.46 allows an attacker to disclose limited information from the appliance via Access to management IP.
